element.title: Menubar
element.desc: A simple gray horizontal menu bar.
element.longdescription:
Note: Redmond components are deprecated. Please consider using LZ Components. If you use this component, you must explicitly include the redmond library:
<include href="redmond"/>

Description:
The menubar tag provides a base view for instances of menu tag. The height is currently fixed at 24 pixels ( for the redmond look ) and the width is constrained to the width of its immediateparent.

Example:
See menu

See also:
command, menu, menuitem, menuseparator
